modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds Viking fantasy mead hall (POI) to the game. This POI must be placed manually - no rwg support yet.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds Viking fantasy mead hall (POI) to the game. This POI must be placed manually – no rwg support yet.

**Manuell Installation:**

1. Download and unpack the Zip data.
2. Place it into your “Mods” folder.
3. Place it in your world and have fun!

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/EihwazDE/7D2D/-/archive/master/7D2D-master.zip?path=Mead%20Hall)**

If you appreciate Eihwaz’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/pools/c/8nSUn4KFGL).

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.com/invite/StrFn7X).

**Credits:** [Eihwaz](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/eihwaz/)
